document_data.name: Scar
document_data.size: 80 miles long and almost 25 miles wide
document_data.mainbody: The '''Scar''' was the massive, eponymous gorge that spanned the width of [[Scardale]] within the southern [[Dalelands]]. The deep cliffs of the canyon enveloped the [[River Ashaba]] on the tail end of its course from the [[Feather Falls (waterfall)|Feather Falls]] waterfall in the west until it emptied into the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] in the east.
document_data.Notable locations:
The chasm of Scardale was so large that it contained a wealth of farmland, a number of small villages as well as all the larger cities of Scardale including:

*[[Chandlerscross]]: Scardale's capital, post [[1370 DR]].

*[[Scardale Town]]: The remnants of the dale's former capital, that served as a port city in the Sea of Fallen Stars.

*[[Scarsdeep]]: A smaller town, nearby to Chandlerscross, that grew in size and population during the dale's occupation.
